items.title: Wolfenbüttels Thriller-Autorin May B. Aweley im Interview
highlights: Discusses pen name rationale and personal background (Polish roots; living in Wolfenbüttel at the time).
Mentions early publication timeline and that the FBI-team series grew based on reader demand.
Includes an audio excerpt reading from ‘Erlöse uns’.

items.title: Interview mit May B. Aweley
highlights: Discusses reading/writing origins, use of pseudonym, and working rituals.
Explains how ‘Puppenbraut’ arose from parental fears; outlines how the FBI-team books developed.
Mentions later projects and desire to return to the FBI-team.

items.title: Skoutz-Jahresendspurt 2017 – zweites Türchen von May B. Aweley
highlights: Guest contribution + giveaway; describes ‘Erinnerung aus Glas’ as her sixth thriller.
Includes references to her Facebook page and an Amazon link to the book.
